reviewText: Nails started peeling back that same night. And in under a week they all came off and ruined my nails completely. I’ve never experienced anything like it. When I confronted Ruma she said that never happened to her and that Im lying to get money because I asked her to fix it she refused and so then I asked for a refund. She was cursing me out over the phone calling me over and over. Most unprofessional dirty and horrible place ever. DO NOT GO HERE

reviewText: I got a gel french manicure & pedicure, and, while this could be attributed to the way I work with my hands, one of my nails chipped just 3 days later. Additionally, it has been less than a week and all of my nails are either beginning to lift, lifting, or have chipped off. For a gel manicure, this is understandably upsetting.My pedicure, on the other hand, still looks flawless after 6 days. The woman who did them was pretty rough when doing my cuticles and the next days they were a little swollen on the area where it hurt while she was doing it- however they do look really nice!

reviewText: I decided to give Ruma a try after reading the wonderful reviews and wow, I am so happy that I did. I came in requesting a removal of the previous SNS job on my nails from another place which did not last very long before they started to chip and lift. She had me soak my nails and even though she was attending to another client, she made sure to check on my nails often which I appreciated. Once she got started on my nails, she was very gentle and thorough while doing them. I liked that she didn’t rush yet the job was still done rather quickly and the results were beautiful. I will definitely be coming back!

reviewText: my boyfriend took me here a few days ago, on Monday, May 30th, 2022. this was my first time ever getting a manicure and a pedicure since i always preferred doing my own nails. my boyfriend has been asking me for a few months now since i’ve always told him no LOL but finally i said yes. this was such a wonderful experience. they clean your nails, exfoliate your legs and feet, give you a little massage for about a minute, (hands too). they also scrape any dead skin on your feet. it was so relaxing and fun to experience this with my boyfriend. he also got his nails fixed up with some clear polish! the price here is definitely right too! i’ll see you guys soon again ☺️ thank you so much for the wonderful experience ⭐️

reviewText: They really pay attention to detail when doing your nails but this place is dirty with acrylic dust everywhere and the seats are cracked. She started working on me with tools that were just laying there that made me nervous, wiped me with a ripped rag, everything felt old and hadn’t been updated, and they were using this giant brush to wipe off my nail files then used it to clean the table. The prices are good but I got gel and my nails chipped two days after. It’s really disappointing, I think they would be a great salon if they just updated their supplies and were cleaner.

reviewText: No idea how this place has rave reviews. It took almost two hours to get a manicure.  They only have 3 ppl working the place and they all take turns on the clients often making them wait. Each step in the manicure and soak took so long. Now let's talk about the place. So dirty, dirty floors, dirty desks. I had to ask if the manicure instruments were clean and they insisted they were however they were sitting next to the sink not the disinfectant machine.  After i asked a few times, They placed it inside machine for 5 mins and just sprayed them down. I noticed the pedicures sink also is dirty. I did not see any cleaning after pedicures. The lady also tried to convince me to get a 10 min massage after i said no twice. She gave  me minute massage and it was not pleasant.  The colors don't match the numbers either.  First and last time there.

reviewText: So this one’s complicated. I went in for the first time a little over a week ago for an acrylic set. I loved how they came out when they were done, and she was so sweet and nice. The only thing for me was that there was excessive glue on my fingers but i washed it off, no big deal. A few days later i noticed my right middle fingernail started to lift, and after a week it completely came off. Because it was only one nail i didn’t bug about it i called to see if it could get fixed and did so today.i went in and something was off, i’m not sure what. She took me before another client that she had already seated. I wouldn’t have minded waiting and honestly I wish I had. The nail repair was free but i didn’t mind paying, especially because i felt this service was rushed. Compared to my left hand, my right middle finger is shorter in length. I watched her like them up so i’m not sure how that happened. Also, the shape of that nail is not the same as the rest; I always get coffin shaped nails but it looks like the normal square shape compared to the rest. in general it seems like she was rushing to get me out of the chair, even when i left i wished her a wonderful day and was met with total silence. The whole experience left me feeling like I was a nuisance. I really like her work so i’m hoping this was just an off day, this was only my second time coming here.
reviewText2:
So this one’s complicated. I went in for the first time a little over a week ago for an acrylic set. I loved how they came out when they were done, and she was so sweet and nice. The only thing for me was that there was excessive glue on my fingers but i washed it off, no big deal. A few days later i noticed my right middle fingernail started to lift, and after a week it completely came off. Because it was only one nail i didn’t bug about it i called to see if it could get fixed and did so today.i went in and something was off, i’m not sure what. She took me before another client that she had already seated. I wouldn’t have minded waiting and honestly I wish I had. The nail repair was free but i didn’t mind paying, especially because i felt this service was rushed. Compared to my left hand, my right middle finger is shorter in length. I watched her like them up so i’m not sure how that happened. Also, the shape of that nail is not the same as the rest; I always get coffin shaped nails but it looks like the normal square shape compared to the rest. in general it seems like she was rushing to get me out of the chair, even when i left i wished her a wonderful day and was met with total silence. The whole experience left me feeling like I was a nuisance. I really like her work so i’m hoping this was just an off day, this was only my second time coming here.Services

reviewText: When i walked in noone was there so it was the perfect oppertunity to really feel out the place and the work of this amazing lady . I got a pedicure and a new set , and she truly took her time . She did an amazing job with everything she did from start to finish and she didn't miss a beat . Her work was very excellent . She deff earned the 5 stars . I wish it was 10 stars altho i would even give her more then that . Cant wait to go back .

reviewText: I went there this Wednesday and I was looking forward to it . I did a gel mani and a pedicure. My gel manicure is coming out already and I dislike how the lady working there did my pedicure when I asked her to fix she did and left the nail salon she said she leaves at 8. However the owner Ruma was there busy on someone else.. poor customer service horrible experience. Will never go back there .
